overview: The third installment of the Award-Winning twink schoolboy series adds another layer of drama and intrigue to the story of the All-American Boys Academy. It’s the start of a new semester and Ryker Madison is quick to learn about the lying, blackmail, scheming and secret screwing indulged by the sexy student body. But it’s not until senior studs Evan Parker and Casey Tanner stumble upon the extracurricular activities of Ryker and the new teacher Mr. Acre that the scandal is truly set in motion. Welcome back Helix Hellcats!
title: Scandal at Helix Academy
